channel.title: Lessons on Basking in the Sun
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons on Basking in the Sun

item.title: Lessons
item.description: Baby massage lessons are taught in your home. Please see the schedule below for availability Lesson information Age suitability Babies between 2 months old and crawling age. Group size Up to 3 babies, plus their carers. Lesson content One 90-minute lesson per week for 4 weeks Lesson 1: Leg and tummy massage Lesson 2: Revision plus chest, arm and face massage
